Your Ultimate Guide to Launching and Scaling a Profitable Mini-Importation Business.

Learn all you need to run a successful mini-importation business; from product and supplier sourcing, importation, marketing of hot and best-selling products from China, Vietnam, UK, USA, Bangladesh, and Turkey.

Reserve Your Spot Now

📆 Date: 28th – 1st September
Time: 10 am – 5 pm
Location: Zoom Call

Contact Form Demo

Unlock Your Mini-Importation Success with Our Premium Digital Marketing Mini Importation Class

Have you ever dreamt of diving into the lucrative world of mini-importation business? Perhaps you’ve already embarked on the journey, only to find yourself lost in the maze of suppliers, frustrated by complex import processes, and overwhelmed by the sheer stress of it all. The struggle is real, from baffling payment procedures to the intricate calculations of shipping fees.

But fear not! Your solution has arrived in the form of the Premium Digital Marketing Mini Importation Class. If you’re yearning for a breakthrough, if you’re tired of the hurdles, this is your beacon of hope.

Reserve Your Spot Now

What to Expect from the Mini-Importation Workshop?

Starting an eCommerce business can be tasking, from finding the right suppliers to setting up the necessary accounts. 

Not to worry, with our Mini-Importation Workshop , we will take you through an in-depth  training where you will learn the tips, tricks, and steps to starting and running a successful mini-importation/dropshipping business. 

Build a flexible and scalable business from the comfort of your home with no capital needed with the step-by-step guide of a highly respected importation coach and successful entrepreneur.

Whether it’s hair, clothes, gadget, and more, our importation coach and serial entrepreneur Faith Sunday Mgbelele, will take you through a detailed 5-day virtual class on how to begin and profit.

In addition, you’ll learn the following: 

  • How to find better suppliers and quality products with access to credible and vetted supplier contacts from countries such as China, Turkey, Uk, the USA, and much more.
  • How to set up and verify your accounts on platforms such as Alipay and discover seamless ways to make purchases on several vetted importation apps.
  • How to ship yours product to Nigeria with low shipping rates. You will learn the best ways to calculate shipping fee
  • How to sell your imported products in Nigeria. You will learn how to run profitable Facebook and Instagram ads
  • How to use the proven OPM strategy to make millions of naira monthly. With this strategy, you don't have to use your own money

The early birds get the fattest offer. Sign up between now and the 25th to get 30% off and a lot more for your money!

Bonuses:

  • Gain Exclusive Access to Canva Pro and Canva Training
  • Free master class on Facebook and Instagram ads
  • Customized target audience for your choice of products
  • ChatGPT prompts for eCommerce social media content
  • Cashaam Virtual Card
  • Terms and conditions apply!

Note: Bonuses are strictly for early birds

Envision a world where you triumph in the mini-importation domain. Over the course of 5 transformative days, we’ll empower you with the tools and knowledge to initiate, nurture, and flourish in your mini-importation venture.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is the training physical?
  1. No, it's a 5-day virtual program held on Zoom.
How long is the training?

The program spans 5 days, hosted virtually on Zoom. You will have 6months of support immediately after the workshop.

How many instructors will be taking the workshop?

Faith Sunday Mgbelele, a seasoned Importation Coach and successful entrepreneur, Dr. Osayi Ekeleme the CEO of Hovina Glasses and a successful entrepreneur will lead the 5-day virtual workshop.

What would I be learning?

You'll delve into all aspects of mini-importation, covering various categories and countries.

Is Mini-Importation Business Hard?

No, with the right skills and knowledge, mini-importation becomes straightforward.

Do I need to be an expert?

Not at all! Our course simplifies mini-importation from scratch, regardless of your background.

Will there be support after the 5 days?

Definitely!! We are here for you and the success of your business. Imagine us holding your hands all through your first steps till you can run.

Have more questions?

Chat with our team by clicking the chat box.
